metadata.Title: CVE-2014-5191 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Preview plugin before 4.4.3 in CKEditor allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-5191` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ckeditor - 4.5.7+dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ckeditor package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.5.7+dfsg-2').
